Activity: Log in to the system and check emails. Address any urgent issues or requests from yesterday.
Review the task list from yesterday and prioritize tasks for today.
Continue configuring new data fields in the development environment. Focus on accuracy and completeness. Use the document and guide to help.

Meet with @clinlead-1 (Clinical Lead) and @rn-1 (Registered Nurse) to discuss the planned data field configurations from a clinical perspective. Gather feedback on usability and relevance. @PEOPLE Send an email to @clinlead-1 and @rn-1 to introduce the new fields and their possible usage scenarios.
Based on feedback from @clinlead-1 and @rn-1, refine the configuration of new data fields. Make necessary adjustments to ensure clinical relevance and usability.
Begin customizing existing workflows related to influenza vaccination and diagnosis. Focus on streamlining data entry and improving efficiency.
Document the modifications made to existing workflows. Create flowcharts and user guides to illustrate the changes. Consult with @trainer-1 on the documentation.
Implement validation rules for the new data fields and modified workflows. Ensure data integrity and prevent errors. Collaborate with @qatest-1 to define test cases.
Review progress, identify any roadblocks, and plan for tomorrow's tasks. Prepare a summary report for @itpm-1 on the week's progress so far. @PEOPLE Send an email with a brief report to @itpm-1.
